name: autoassign
description: Assigns tickets to viewing user if ticket and user have same group.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && npm run build
scripts.dev: run-when-changed --watch "src/*.js" --exec "npm run build" & zcli apps:server & browser-sync start -c browsersync.config.cjs
scripts.prepackage: rm -rf build/package && mkdir -p build/package/assets && cp -R assets ./build/package && cp -R translations ./build/package && cp manifest.json README.md LICENSE ./build/package
scripts.package: npm run productionize && cd build/package && zip -q -r -X autoassign.zip .
scripts.publish: npm run test && npm run package
